author: Klara S.
comment: I've had this app for years now and it's great! I love the group chat function and the unique emojis. It's great for communicating with others even from different countries. The video and call chats aren't the best at times, they do cut off randomly sometimes whereas video calls on other platforms don't as often. However I rarely use those functions, so this is a perfect texting app I'm very happy with.

author: Zulfina Qurotul
comment: My account is not being suspended but, whenever I try to enter open groupchat, it always tell me your action have been suspended and should call the customer service for this. It always get me troubled because there is no FAQ about this in kakaotalk CS. Please fix this. Thankyou for your hardwork.

author: Cherry Collins
comment: Horrible update, can no longer send pictures or videos, it just shows as sending then shows a red "X" for no delivery. My stickers I bought are now useless. Fix this issue and I will change the rating  EDIT: issue has been fixed, I can send photos and videos again, and all my stickers work now. Thank you

author: Maryiam
comment: I love KakaoTalk. The only problem I'm having is that, when a person sends a message to me, it is often marked as 'read' when I haven't even opened it. I'm worried it might create misunderstanding that I seen-zoned people. I hope you will fix it.

author: Oriza Ramadhani
comment: Hi, I'm installing this app cause it's a great app to communicate with people. So, hit me up if you wanna talk. I'm a moeslim and also a Carat, Army, and 5SOSFam. My ID is Orizaiza20 . Feel free to chat me :)

author: Chai Lip Kiew
comment: I use this on a huawei p9 lite and I have notification problems and I have checked the settings. I do not receive any notifications on messages unless I open the app.:( please fix this But a great app, love the interface and everything else.

author: Vionnika Gesty
comment: Why can't I send my chats lately? It says that my connection is unstable but I found it fine with other application and my connection is pretty stable and fine. What happen? Fix this ASAP please.

author: Jenny Kim
comment: I dont understand. Why cant i send messages? It keeps showing that i can send messages to those i have never chatted before

author: Robert Bonneau
comment: It would be nice if I could see or also send pictures and stickers I was able to do it yesterday but today I'm not able to do that fix the app I enjoy sending pictures and seeing the Emoji stickers but like I says don't know what happened since yesterday now if someone sends a picture or sends a sticker I don't see it I see a blank and it's not letting me send emojis or pictures fix the app had this app for over 5 years never had a problem like this before fix the problem and I put it back to five star if not you want to ignore fixing the app maybe I'll tell all my friends to move till the line app

author: hitesh awasthi
comment: Hiii....frm past 2 years i am using this app often i love this app also nice to see that we can talk over phone through hours without any disturbances nice video quality also.

author: Sooyeon Jeong
comment: Changing my 5 star review to 1 star. Like some of the users here, I also cannot send images anymore regardless of the image size. On top of that, i cant even see any of the emoticons that i purchased. These definitely are important bugs that need to be fixed asap.

author: Joao Pedro
comment: It is a great app. But it doesn't have some important things like "read receipts" and the hability to reply some messages, and to delete some messages already sent. But stills good

author: Jane Dapal-ag
comment: "it's not really free it needs internet and wifi,i hope we can use it by just opening the mobile data without charges"  but this app is really cute,awesome,easy to use"

author: Anup Sharma
comment: Every thing is ok but have a problem in video calling because in ringing period we don't have any clue to know is really ringing the other side

author: Don Juan
comment: This app is terrible I downloaded it to add my friend. I added my friend and they're blocking me to talk to my friend because this is the first time I use the app. This app is not user friendly

author: Matthew Leung
comment: Broken after this latest update!!!!!  I will send a kakao and later it just shows up with red X that sending failed.  Rinse and repeat, same problem.  All other apps and chat programs work FINE.  Basically Kakao now useless, unless fixed...  Really disappointed.

Okay so, It's just like a app name "LINE" because it gives us themes too but the themes are much better in this app and the quality is good and i appreciate that.  if you are reading this this app helps ♡
title: ♡ good ♡

author: Arnomar
comment: Pictures that I want to send always failed and the pictures sent to me always failed to load , also my profile picture is visible but the cover photo is not there even on other phone its visible please fix this im not a fan of this thing for now , 2 stars for the smoothness without any lag thanks

I CAN'T SIGN IN !! It always say 'unstable connection, please try again later' i already try so much time and my connection is so stable. I can even play ml with my internet. Please fix !!!! (Sorry for any wrong grammar^_^)

author: Noor Farhana
comment: Can be used until last night. And suddenly i can't use it today until "unstable network connection" happen again like before. I will give 5 star if you fix the connection.

author: Shubham Sherekar
comment: Awesome app!! My ID is Shubham96.. Hit me up if you wanna just talk about random stuff!
Can't see stickers and profile pictures. Also can't send messages for some reason. Sometimes it gets better. I use Redmi Note 4

author: shafiqah snan
comment: I can't send messages even when i have good network signals. Please fix this asap

author: Adhityya agri astarini
comment: I can't see emoticons at all. I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling but the problem persists. It happened all of the sudden. Please help.

author: Ayu Prasasti
comment: I can't send any chat this days even i have good signal. What is happen?

author: A Google User
comment: Unable to send pictures all night. Terrible customer service. No notification from the company. Emoticons stopped working. Voice and video calls stopped working.

author: Yuri Kim
comment: Great app but sad that it only supports one phone per number... Wish I could use same ID on my work phone and iPad...

author: HahJin Choi
comment: I loved this app but from today it does NOT let me send any image files(pictures). Please fix this

author: Meduza Syrinx Abata
comment: I think it much better if we can see who are the friends of are friends and if whose friend are active or open so we can easily communicate

author: Norikotan
comment: My account was suspended, though I didn't break any rules. I sent two messages to the customer service with no answer back... Please fix this...
Your KEY FEATURES: FAST is not valid at all. Network issues everytime without fail!

author: Chris Park
comment: this video and free calling sounds are so noisy plz reduce sound level

author: Qaiser Abbasi
comment: It's asking for allow record voice, allow take pictures... It's means no privacy, some where our private things are being recorded...??

author: ulfcy61
comment: Excuse me but why I can't send text??? Please fix it. I felt regret that I updated it ㅠㅠ

author: elsa irasanti
comment: Why cant i send a message? It keeps showing that i cant send message to those i have never chatted before

author: Laura Agnesya
comment: Help! My access got suspended when i try to join a group chat

author: Van
comment: Worst interface. Ugly stickers. Can't even find your friends

author: Joann Woo
comment: KakaoTalk is a great way to text and chat with your family and friends.  If you love and amazing app that allows you to call,facetime, and message by photos and adorable emoticons, then you must get this app.

author: DR. A.N.K.
comment: Hi. I am unable to join this group chat. It is saying my access is suspended. Why is it saying so?

comment: My account got suspended and I dont know the reason why..
